values: 烧；燃烧；使（燃料）燃烧；着火；焚烧；烧焦；使烧焦；烧煳；烧着；烧毁；烧坏；烧死；烧伤；烫伤；灼伤；使晒伤；晒伤；烧制；烧录（数据；光盘等）；消耗（能量）；感到灼热；感到刺痛；火辣辣地痛；发热；发光
烧伤；烫伤；灼伤；烧痕；酸痛感；灼痛；火辣感觉；燃烧造成的损害；能量消耗；溪流；小溪；小河

synonym.mean: 燃烧；烧毁，灼伤；激起…的愤怒

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 燃烧（burn的过去式、过去分词形式）
燃烧器；火炉；[化工] 燃烧炉；灯头
擦亮；使…光亮；将…打磨光亮

word_group.brief_definition: 过度劳累, (起早贪黑而疲惫不堪)超负荷工作
word_group.phrase: burn the candle at both ends

word_group.brief_definition: 焚为平地, 烧得精光
燃料用尽而熄灭；烧坏；停止工作；极度劳累
不留退路；破釜沉舟, 背水而战
一有(钱)就想花, 花钱没有节制
word_group.phrase: burn a hole in your pocket

word_group.brief_definition: 打烙印；将局部额外曝光
打烙印；将局部额外曝光

bilingual.source: You also have to wonder at the unique madness of a language in which a house can burn up as it burns down.
bilingual.target: 你也不得不惊叹于一种语言的独特疯狂，其中房子可以在燃烧时烧毁。
我们需要更多的木材来燃烧。
运动可以帮助你燃烧脂肪。
篝火会燃烧好几个小时。
运动可以帮助你燃烧热量。
他们在节日时会燃烧艾草。
运动可以帮助你燃烧卡路里。

bilingual.source: This book teaches you how to burn flab.
bilingual.target: 这本书教你如何燃烧赘肉。

list.abstract: Burn指一种物理现象。由热水、蒸气、火焰等热力因素所致，作用于皮肤，由表皮到深层的损害。
动漫「游戏王」新系列「游戏王ARC-V」的OP2。由日本乐队组合「超特急」演唱。

yingyinNormal.en: Love lip-balm? Try applying it 1500 times to burn 200 calories.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喜欢护唇膏吗？擦1500次就可以燃烧200卡路里。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're bored and happen to fall asleep, you'll need over 3 hours to burn the same amount, but you will be burning calories even in your sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果无聊到睡着，你需要花超过三小时燃烧相同热量，但在睡觉时也会燃烧卡路里。

yingyinNormal.en: He is consumed by it. If he is not stopped, this world will burn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他被它所侵蚀，如果他没有被阻止，这个世界将会被燃烧。

yingyinNormal.en: For example, why not chew gum for 18 hours to burn off those 200 calories?
yingyinNormal.zh: 例如，为何不花18小时嚼口香糖燃烧200卡路里？

yingyinNormal.en: If things heat up, you only need an hour of sex to burn off 200 calories.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打得火热的话，只需要一小时的爱爱来燃烧200大卡。

yingyinNormal.en: Spend a good 2 and a half hours surfing through channels, and you'll actually burn those 200 calories.
yingyinNormal.zh: 花两个半小时转频道，就可以燃烧200大卡。

yingyinNormal.en: Simply drinking 8 glasses of water will burn an extra 70 calories a day, fresh water that is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要喝八杯水，干净的水，每天就可以多燃烧70大卡。

yingyinNormal.en: With their powerful engines, these cars will burn through nearly 10,000 gallons of gasoline, tearing around the track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它的发动机很强大，装着1万加仑的汽油在跑道上行驶，可能使车身燃烧起来。

yingyinNormal.en: After taking a look at what 200 Food Calories looks like a few weeks ago, we thought: what does it look like to burn these calories off?
yingyinNormal.zh: 前几周看过了200大卡的食物是怎样的，我们想：燃烧这些卡路里又会如何？

yingyinNormal.en: And while 200 calories is an arbitrary number that we chose, a pound of fat is equivalent to roughly 3500 calories. So, burn away!
yingyinNormal.zh: 200大卡只是我们选的数字，一磅的脂肪大约等于3500大卡，所以，尽情燃烧热量。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure, the average person who runs for a good 20 minutes will burn roughly 200 calories, but is that really the most fun way to do it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不置可否，平均一人跑20分钟，可消耗大概200卡路里，但这是燃烧卡路里最有趣的方法吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Eventually, the universe will run out of gas to form stars, and the stars themselves will run out of fuel and burn out, leaving the universe with only black holes in it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最终，宇宙将会由于缺少气体而无法形成恒星，同时恒星自身也会燃烧殆尽，宇宙中留下的只会是一个个黑洞。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you touched the ground, burn you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你掉到地面，我会烧掉你。

yingyinNormal.en: Mission, we're in full OMS burn, trying to back out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 控制中心，我们已开动最大马力，意图后退。

yingyinNormal.en: And also, polyester gym shorts don't burn. They melt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，涤纶运动短裤不会烧起来。而是会融化。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't burn it this time. Please? I never go and burn it, man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这次别再烤焦了，好吗？我从来不干这事，哥们。

yingyinNormal.en: Cutting off burn. Mission.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正在关闭。控制中心

yingyinNormal.en: But do you see that? Fire is catching. And if we burn, you burn with us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你们看到了吗？熊熊火焰已经点燃，如果我们被点燃，你们必会一起葬身火海。

yingyinNormal.en: How do we know the wire's not gonna burn up? Because I invented it. I assure you, it won't burn up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们怎么保证电线不会被烧坏呢？因为这是我发明的，我保证它不会烧坏。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh hey, but that's sad about you though, what happened? What happened? Burn out? Burn all out, did you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但可惜你要走了，出了什么事？出了什么事？精力耗尽了，精力耗尽了是吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 燃烧; 烧毁; 烧伤

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 灼伤的；燃烧；点燃；可燃的

word_family.mean: v. 烧；燃烧；晒黑；晒痛；晒伤；以…作燃料；飞速驾驶；刻录；烧伤；烫伤

sense_info_list.zh: 燃烧; 烧毁; 烧伤

examination_example.sentence: The strategy also aims to ensure that carbon in woody material is locked away in the form of solid lumber or <highlight>burned</highlight> as biofuel in vehicles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该战略还旨在确保木质材料中的碳以固体木材的形式被封存，或作为生物燃料在车辆中燃烧。

examination_example.sentence: Already, since 2010, drought and insects have killed over 100 million trees in California, and wildfires have <highlight>burned</highlight> hundreds of thousands of acres.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2010年以来，旱灾和昆虫已在加利福尼亚杀死了1亿多棵树，野火已烧毁了数十万英亩的土地。

examination_example.sentence: Then his marriage failed, his career <highlight>burned</highlight> out and his drinking became serious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，他的婚姻失败了，事业一蹶不振，酗酒愈发严重。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“烘烤、烤暖”，指在火上或火旁直接烘烤。把食物烤脆，烘烤成黄色。
意为“烘、焙、烤”，通常指在密封的容器中或在锅上直接烘烤，食物不直接接触火。
意为“烤、炙”，指用明火烤，通常是在烤架或铁丝格子上烤。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 烧毁; 灼伤; 晒伤; 伤疤

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 燃烧器；刻录机；灯头；煤气头；炉膛燃烧室；燃烧；人；能快速移动的球员

word_family.mean: v. 烧；燃烧；晒黑；晒痛；晒伤；以…作燃料；飞速驾驶；刻录；烧伤；烫伤

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 燃料用尽而熄灭；烧坏；停止工作；极度劳累

sense_info_list.en: damage or injure by heat or fire
sense_info_list.zh: 烧毁; 灼伤; 晒伤; 伤疤

examination_example.sentence: My job was to toss items in boxes so they could be sent to be <highlight>burned</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的工作是把物品扔进箱子里，然后把它们送去烧掉。

examination_example.sentence: Most of the wooden roof beams have been <highlight>burned</highlight>, and parts of the concrete holding up the roof have collapsed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大部分的木质屋顶横梁已经被烧毁，支撑屋顶的部分混凝土已经坍塌。

examination_example.sentence: The emergency services picked through the <highlight>burnt</highlight> debris.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 紧急救援人员在烧焦的废墟中搜寻。

examination_example.sentence: A greater disaster was averted by members of the Paris fire brigade, who risked their lives to remain inside the <highlight>burning</highlight> monument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎消防队成员冒着生命危险留在燃烧的纪念碑内，避免了一场更大的灾难。

examination_example.sentence: Had the bell towers' wooden frames <highlight>burned</highlight> down, the heavy bells would have crashed down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果钟楼的木架被烧毁，沉重的钟就会倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: There was shock and tears as the cathedral spire caught fire, <highlight>burned</highlight> and then collapsed into itself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当大教堂的尖顶着火，燃烧，然后倒塌时，人们震惊，流泪。

examination_example.sentence: Customers can bring shoes of any brand into an Adidas store instead of being <highlight>burned</highlight> as trash.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消费者可以把任何品牌的废旧鞋子带到阿迪达斯商店，而不是像以前一样把它当成垃圾直接焚烧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 烧毁; 灼伤; 晒伤; 伤疤

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 烧过的；烧焦的；烧伤的；焦味的；烧成焦糖的；暗的；深的

word_family.mean: v. 烧；燃烧；晒黑；晒痛；晒伤；以…作燃料；飞速驾驶；刻录；烧伤；烫伤

examination_example.sentence: The businessmen say that on Earth, beans can easily break apart and get <highlight>burned</highlight> in the roaster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商人说，在地球上，豆子很容易碾碎并被烘烤机烤焦。

examination_example.sentence: They can easily get <highlight>burned</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们很容易燃烧。

examination_example.sentence: His house was <highlight>burnt</highlight> down in a fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的房子在火灾中被烧毁了。

sense_info_list.en: feel a very strong emotion or desire
damage or injure by heat or fire
sense_info_list.zh: 烧毁; 灼伤; 晒伤; 伤疤

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 烧过的；烧焦的；烧伤的；焦味的；烧成焦糖的；暗的；深的
adj. 燃烧的；炙热的；明亮的；热切的；紧要的；强烈的；十分重要的；热烈争论的
n. 燃烧器；刻录机；灯头；煤气头；炉膛燃烧室；燃烧；人；能快速移动的球员

word_family.mean: v. 烧；燃烧；晒黑；晒痛；晒伤；以…作燃料；飞速驾驶；刻录；烧伤；烫伤

examination_example.sentence: Then she caught the smell of <highlight>burning</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后她闻到了烧焦的味道。

examination_example.sentence: Jenna threw the <highlight>burnt</highlight> piece into the sink and put in the other slice of bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍娜把烧焦的面包片扔进水槽，然后放进另一片面包。

examination_example.sentence: After you exercise, you continue to <highlight>burn</highlight> calories throughout the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运动后，你一整天都在燃烧卡路里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 烧过的；烧焦的；烧伤的；焦味的；烧成焦糖的；暗的；深的
adj. 燃烧的；炙热的；明亮的；热切的；紧要的；强烈的；十分重要的；热烈争论的

word_family.mean: v. 烧；燃烧；晒黑；晒痛；晒伤；以…作燃料；飞速驾驶；刻录；烧伤；烫伤

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 过度劳累；(起早贪黑而疲惫不堪)超负荷工作
word_level_phrase_info.phrase: burn the candle at both ends

examination_example.sentence: He was also puzzled by the black stones people used to <highlight>burn</highlight> to produce heat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他也对人们用来燃烧产生热量的黑色石头感到困惑。

examination_example.sentence: Extreme weather led to wildfires <highlight>burning</highlight> in Europe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 极端天气导致欧洲发生野火。

examination_example.sentence: In the upper parts of the atmosphere, it will <highlight>burn</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大气层的上部，它会燃烧起来。

examination_example.sentence: I wondered why he wanted to <highlight>burn</highlight> me, and I cried and knocked at the door.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不知道他为什么要烧死我，我哭着敲门。

examination_example.sentence: People usually <highlight>burn</highlight> or bury (埋) it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们通常烧毁或埋它。

examination_example.sentence: There are only 2,000 bumblebee bats left in Thailand because people <highlight>burn</highlight> the forest where they live.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 泰国只剩下 2000 只大黄蜂蝙蝠，因为人们烧毁了他们居住的森林。

examination_example.sentence: As a result, you can <highlight>burn</highlight> more calories (卡路里).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，你可以消耗更多的卡路里。

examination_example.sentence: It can help clean up the earth and <highlight>burn</highlight> more calories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以帮助清理地球并消耗更多的卡路里。

examination_example.sentence: Another reason is that plogging <highlight>burns</highlight> more calories（卡路里）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个原因是跑步消耗更多的卡路里。

examination_example.sentence: Put the cream on the <highlight>burn</highlight> twice or three times a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天两次或三次将奶油涂在烧伤处。

examination_example.sentence: Cream to treat pain and infection（感染）from small <highlight>burn</highlight> on skin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用于治疗皮肤小烧伤引起的疼痛和感染的乳膏。

examination_example.sentence: We should visit a doctor if we have serious <highlight>burns</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们有严重烧伤，我们应该去看医生。
